greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle formed from the even-numbered rows of A088855.
link: Johann Cigler, Some remarks and conjectures related to lattice paths in strips along the x-axis, arXiv:1501.04750 [math.CO], 2015-2016.
mathematica: row[n_] := CoefficientList[Sum[Binomial[n, k]^2 *x^(2*k), {k, 0, n}] + Sum[Binomial[n, k]*Binomial[n, k - 1]* x^(2*k - 1), {k, 0, n}], x];
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 23 2014
ext: Row n=8 corrected by _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 07 2018
